definition: the area taken up by some object
details:
noun
- the area taken up by some object
= example: the area taken up by some object
- a mark of a foot or shoe on a surface
= example: a mark of a foot or shoe on a surface
= synonyms: step
- a trace suggesting that something was once present or felt or otherwise important
= example: a trace suggesting that something was once present or felt or otherwise important
